mapper.insert: insert into product_review(ph_num, review_content, review_img, satis_size, satis_color, satis_thickness, satis_brightness, ani_neck_length, ani_chest_length, ani_back_length, ani_weight, review_score, pd_num) values(#{ph_num}, #{review_content}, #{review_img}, #{satis_size}, #{satis_color}, #{satis_thickness}, #{satis_brightness}, #{ani_neck_length}, #{ani_chest_length}, #{ani_back_length}, #{ani_weight}, #{review_score}, #{pd_num})

mapper.select: select avg(review_score) from product_review where pd_num = #{pd_num}
